name: Your City!
description:
Your City is a game about relaxing yourself by placing hexagon tiles with landscapes of roads, woods, rivers and villages. It is a building type of strategy game; aiming to build a new growing world. With the on going new challenges and score system, you will achieve different goals in every level. The game is for everyone who needs a break from the noises and crowds of city life.

Gameplay

Your City starts with a well formed small area where you will be adding new hexagon tiles one by one. You will rotate and place the tiles by its suitability to the well formed area. As a result, you get points by placing the same areas together to form a mega landscape.
